text: This is a list of the winners of the annual International Bible Contest (Hebrew: חידון התנ"ך). There are events for both Adults and Youth. Entries in the same box represent a tie for that place. ==Youth Winners== {| class="wikitable" |+Winners of the International Bible Youth Contest !Serial !Gregorian Year !Hebrew Year !1st Place !2nd Place !3rd Place |- |1 |1963 |תשכ"ג‏ | | | |- |2 |1965 |תשכ"ה‏ | |Herzel was the brother of Balpor, the 1st Place winner the same year. | |- |3 |1966 |תשכ"ו‏ | | | |- |4 |1967 |תשכ"ז‏ | | | |- |5 |1968 |תשכ"ח‏ | | | |- |6 |1969 |תשכ"ט‏ | | | |- |7 |1970 |תש"ל‏ | | | |- |8 |1971 |תשל"א‏ | | | |- |9 |1972 |תשל"ב‏ | | | |- |10 |1973 |תשל"ג | | | |- |11 |1974 |תשל"ד‏ | Originally Chaim Werner was announced as the 1st place winner and Gilad Neumann and Israel Peles tied for 2nd place, but after an appeal and reconsideration, it became evident that the points were wrong. Following the amendment, Gilad Neumann, Adiel Levy, Israel Peles and Amos Beitan were announced as 1st place winners and Haim Werner as 2nd place winner (this is on the list of recent quiz winners on
